parameters.name: DestRegion
parameters.description:
The region where the geo-redundant backup set is stored.

> - Required for geo-redundant backups.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SrcRegion
parameters.description:
The region where the source instance of the geo-redundant backup is located.

> - Required for geo-redundant backups.
